title: Bug 23267[Import/Export] Import Project should have a default folder
description: Bug 23267[Import/Export] Import Project should have a default folder
OB: When importing an existing Eclipse project on XP and clicking the Browse button, the dialog that appears does not have a suitable default folder. Instead, it displays the desktop, my computer, etc. The default folder should be set to the default content location if no other folder is specified.
EB: Currently, when importing a project in Eclipse on XP and clicking the Browse button, the dialog opens with an incorrect default folder. It should display the default content location instead.
SR: When importing an existing Eclipse project on XP and clicking the Browse button, ensure that the dialog has a suitable default folder set. If no folder is specified, it should default to the default content location.
